Consumer OAuth

Zype provides an authentication mechanism for consumer authentication. First, you need to have a consumer created (see our consumer docs on how to create a consumer). Once a consumer has been created, you can authenticate to get an access token. This authentication token is then used to authenticate API requests on the behalf of your end user.

How to get an access token

Via password grant flow

The password grant flow allows you to pass in a user’s email address and password and get an authentication token in return.

 POST - https://api.zype.com/oauth/token/?client_id=client_id&client_secret=client_secret&email=email&password=password&redirect_uri=redirect_uri

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
client_id   String
client_secret   String
email Email of the end user String
password Password of the end user String
redirect_uri   String

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{
  "access_token":"dbaf9757982a9e738f05d249b7b5b4a266b3a139049317c4909f2f263572c781",
  "token_type":"bearer",
  "expires_in":7200,
  "refresh_token":"76ba4c5c75c96f6087f58a4de10be6c00b29ea1ddc3b2022ee2016d1363e3a7c",
  "scope":"public"
}

Via authorization code flow

We will be supporting this flow in the future. If you have a need for this type of oauth flow. Please reach out.

How to check the status of an access token

To check the status of an access token, you can get the details about the token used for authentication.

Parameters

Parameter | Function | Type ——— | ——– | —-

Response

Check if expired

Check expiration time

How to refresh access token

Your access token will expire after BLANK. To refresh your access token, you will need to post your refresh token and get a new authentication token in return.

 POST - https://api.zype.com/oauth/token/?client_id=client_id&client_secret=client_secret&refresh_token=refresh_token

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
client_id   String
client_secret   String
refresh_token Token that allows you to refresh your access token String

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{  
    "access_token":"ad0b5847cb7d254f1e2ff1910275fe9dcb95345c9d54502d156fe35a37b93e80",
    "token_type":"bearer",
    "expires_in":30,
    "refresh_token":"cc38f78a5b8abe8ee81cdf25b1ca74c3fa10c3da2309de5ac37fde00cbcf2815",
    "scope":"public"
  }
